//for ALU
    //add method
    (+,+) case
    add(1,2), 3
    add(1,3), 4
    add(2505, 10023), 12528
    add(1101, 3320), 4421

    (-,+) case
    add(-40, 50), 10
    add(-100, 50), -50
    add(-13203, 20522), 7319
    add(-23555, 13200), -10355

    (+,-) case
    add(30, -3), 27
    add(235352, -552211), -316859
    add(552528, -268089), 284439

    (-,-) case
    add(-1,-3), -4
    add(-279320, -328847), -608167
    add(-323488, -23428), -346916

    (+,+) case
    add(00000000 00000000 00000000 00000001, 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000010), 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000011
    add(00000000 00000000 00000000 00000001, 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000011), 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000100
    add(00000000 00000000 00001001 11001001, 00000000 00000000 00100111 00100111), 00000000 00000000 00110000 11110000
    add(00000000 00000000 00000100 01001101, 00000000 00000000 00001100 11111000), 00000000 00000000 00010001 01000101

    (-,+) case
    add(11111111 11111111 11111111 11011000, 00000000 00000000 00000000 00110010), 00000000 00000000 00000000 00001010
    add(11111111 11111111 11111111 10011100, 00000000 00000000 00000000 00110010), 11111111 11111111 11111111 11001110
    add(11111111 11111111 11001100 01101101, 00000000 00000000 01010000 00101010), 00000000 00000000 00011100 10010111
    add(11111111 11111111 10100011 11111101, 00000000 00000000 00110011 10010000), 11111111 11111111 11010111 10001101
    
    (+,-) case
    add(00000000 00000000 00000000 00011110, 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111101), 00000000 00000000 00000000 00011011
    add(00000000 00000011 10010111 01011000, 11111111 11110111 10010010 11101101), 11111111 11111011 00101010 01000101
    add(00000000 00001000 01101110 01010000, 11111111 11111011 11101000 11000111), 00000000 00000100 01010111 00010111
    
    (-,-) case
    add(11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111, 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111101), 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111100
    add(11111111 11111011 10111100 11101000, 11111111 11111010 11111011 01110001), 11111111 11110110 10111000 01011001 
    add(11111111 11111011 00010000 01100000, 11111111 11111111 10100100 01111100), 11111111 11111010 10110100 11011100 
    
    -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

    //nand method
    nand(10110110, 11101100), 01011011
    nand(01011101, 10010101), 11101010
    nand(01011011, 11101010), 10110101
    nand(11011011, 10001000), 01110111
    nand(11100101, 00011010), 11111111
    nand(11111111, 01110111), 10001000

    -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

    //sub method
    (+,+) case
    sub(100, 10), 90
    sub(0, 20), -20

    (-,+) case
    sub(-10, 30), -40
    sub(-80, 50), -130
    
    (+,-) case
    sub(40, -50), 90

    (-,-) case


    (+,+) case
    sub(00000000 00000000 00000000 01100100, 00000000 00000000 00000000 00001010), 00000000 00000000 00000000 01011010
    sub(00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000, 00000000 00000000 00000000 00010100), 11111111 11111111 11111111 11101100
    
    (-,+) case
    sub(11111111 11111111 11111111 11110110, 00000000 00000000 00000000 00011110), 11111111 11111111 11111111 01111110
    sub(11111111 11111111 11111111 10110000, 00000000 00000000 00000000 00110010), 11111111 11111111 11111111 11100010  

    (+,-) case
    sub(00000000 00000000 00000000 00101000, 11111111 11111111 11111111 11001110), 00000000 00000000 00000000 01011010

    (-,-) case

    -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

    //compare method
    equal case
    compare(11001001, 11001001), 1
    compare(00110110, 00110110), 1
    compare(10101001 10100010, 10101001 10100010), 1
    compare(01001101 01101101, 01001101 01101101), 1
    compare(10100101 10001101 10010010, 10100101 10001101 10010010), 1
    compare(00010110 00111011 01111011, 00010110 00111011 01111011), 1
    compare(11001001 00111011 01101101 10101001, 11001001 00111011 01101101 10101001), 1
    compare(01011010 11101101 00010110 11010001, 01011010 11101101 00010110 11010001), 1

    not equal case
    compare(11001001, 00110110), 0
    compare(01101011, 01101101), 0
    compare(10101001 10100010, 01001101 01101101), 0
    compare(00011010 10100011, 11010110 01001010), 0
    compare(10100101 10001101 10010010, 00010110 00111011 01111011), 0
    compare(00011010 10100101 11010110, 01011001 01101010 01011010), 0
    compare(11001001 00111011 01101101 10101001, 01011010 11101101 00010110 11010001), 0
    compare(00110101 10101001 10010101 01010101, 01011010 11101010 01110101 01101010), 0

    -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

    //not method
    not(01010101), 10101010
    not(10101001), 01010110
    not(10101001 10100011), 01010110 01011100
    not(00111011 01011010), 11000100 10100101
    not(10100010 10100101 00010110), 01011101 01011010 11101001
    not(10010010 10100101 00101110), 01101101 01011010 11010001
    not(11010110 10010010 00111011 10101001), 00101001 01101101 11000100 01010110 
    not(01010011 01100101 11010100 10001101), 10101100 10011010 00101011 01110010
